question: The sequence of layers of atmosphere from earth to upwards is
option1: troposphere, tropopause, stratosphere, stratopause, mesosphere, mesopause, ionosphere(thermosphere, thermopause, exosphere)
option4: troposphere, tropopause, stratosphere, mesosphere , exosphere, thermosphere, thermopause}
answer: troposphere, tropopause, stratosphere, stratopause, mesosphere, mesopause, ionosphere(thermosphere, thermopause, exosphere)
